title: Alif Cloud
description: A School Mangement System for local institutions to digitise and automate the admin tasks.
challenges: This project was a major learning lesson for me. I came across many different concepts Auth 2.0, Time Manipulation in JS  and web scraping.
features: Built a simple API using Node and Express to serve the database
Worked with a team of 2 to develop this app

title: SD Rota Automation App
description: A Nodejs productivity application to create google calender events after web scraping, using Puppeteer js, the Sports Direct Web App.
challenges: This project was a major learning lesson for me. I came across many different concepts Auth 2.0, Time Manipulation in JS  and web scraping.
features: Utilized Google Calender API and Auth0 2.0 to autheticate users
Puppeteer.js to scrape the web application

title: Food Hunter
description: An Vanilla JavaScript recipe search application utilizing powered by an API to provide recipes and filter them based on type of diet and calories.
features: Utilized Google Calender API and Auth0 2.0 to autheticate users

title: LEC Education
description: I designed and developed wordpress theme for a local business to create a better online presence and increase sign-ups for there business.
challenges: I was tasked to establish a modern website that increased brand awareness and attracted new customers by increasing sign-ups. I started by doing brand research and developing the style guide using the existing logo. After that created a wireframe for the client.
features: Worked with a local client to deliver a modern and responsive Wordpress theme
Created a events page that can be customised by the client
